html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-00042021-01-08,  IT,  ,  , 
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister for International Trade of DONALD WILLIAM CURRIE of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Robert H. Pitfield, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Business Development Bank of Canada Act
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister for International Trade of DONALD WILLIAM CURRIE of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Robert H. Pitfield, whose term has expired.
